channel.title: Server status problem solved!Click here
channel.description:
Hi, Since many people are asking about what happend with the server status page, and where can they now find a server status page, I made a topic which will for once and all answer! Spamming just slows the forum! So : There are 2 forums(websites) I know, that have a server status with many already put up servers. Its up to date and works. 1: rs-server.net =here you can register and put up your own server for others to know about(answering another question about" how do i advertise") 2: dodian.com = another server status page, which also has many servers listed.
Please,PLEASE donot spamm anymore about this! I answered for the last time and please also other mods etc., do not answer it again, cause it will make it worse! Thanks RS CHamp2

item.title: Server status problem solved!Click here
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Hi,
Since many people are asking about what happend with the server status page, and where can they now find a server status page, I made a topic which will for once and all answer! Spamming just slows the forum!
So :
There are 2 forums(websites) I know, that have a server status with many already put up servers. Its up to date and works.
1: rs-server.net =here you can register and put up your own server for others to know about(answering another question about" how do i advertise")
2: dodian.com = another server status page, which also has many servers listed.

Please,PLEASE donot spamm anymore about this!
I answered for the last time and please also other mods etc., do not answer it again, cause it will make it worse!
Thanks
RS CHamp2
